title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
ingredients: 1 can (15.5 ounces) beans, low-sodium, undrained (pinto, kidney, red, or black)
1 can (15.2 ounces) corn, drained (or 10-oz package of frozen corn)
1 can (14.5 ounces) crushed tomatoes, low-sodium, undrained
directions: Wash hands with soap and water.
Place the contents of all 3 cans into a pan.
Continue to stir over medium heat until heated thoroughly.
Refrigerate leftovers. Notes Learn more about: Corn Tomatoes
